description: This file defines the data model for a user's habit, including the Habit class and the GoalType enum. It specifies the properties and constructor for habits within the application, and it imports Flutter's material package solely for potential UI or data considerations.

classes.name: Habit
classes.description: Data model representing a user's habit, including properties like id, name, description, goal type, goal count, timestamps for creation and last completion, and a list of completions.

methods.name: Habit
methods.description: Constructor for the Habit class, initializes a new habit instance with provided properties and defaults for createdAt (current time) and completions (empty list).
